item.title: until one is commited
item.description:
Having Doubt?

Doubt kills the warrior spirit.

“Until one is committed, there is hesitancy, the chance to draw back, always ineffectiveness. Concerning all acts of initiative and creation, there is one elementary truth the ignorance of which kills countless ideas and splendid plans: that the moment one definitely commits oneself, then providence moves too. All sorts of things occur to help one that would never otherwise have occurred. A whole stream of events issues from the decision, raising in ones favor all manner of unforeseen incidents, meetings and material assistance which no man could have dreamed would have come his way…

–W.H. Murray, of the Scottish Himalayan Expedition

```

item.title: vi - Left Margin Showing Solid Color
item.description:
Tabs Showing up with extra white space after installing sfp13

The situation looks like this:

The solution in this case is to remove the following plug-in from vundle:

~/.vimrc.bundles.local

Add:

UnBundle 'nathanaelkane/vim-indent-guides'

Run:

$ vi
 
  :PluginClean

item.title: Stay hungry, stay foolish...
item.description:
If you receive an email from me, you will see:

“stay hungry, stay foolish” - steve jobs (1955 - 2011)

Jobs quoted The Whole Earth Catalog at the 2005 Standord Commencment Graduation
